:mod:`summit.multiview_platform.monoview_classifiers.svm_linear`
================================================================

.. py:module:: summit.multiview_platform.monoview_classifiers.svm_linear


svm_linear
----------


.. py:data:: classifier_class_name
   :value: 'SVMLinear'


.. py:class:: SVMLinear(random_state=None, C=1.0, **kwargs)



   This class is an adaptation of scikit-learn's `SVC <https://scikit-learn.org/stable/modules/generated/sklearn.svm.SVC.html>`_

   Here, it is the linear kernel version


   .. py:attribute:: param_names
      :value: ['C', 'random_state']



   .. py:attribute:: distribs
